title: Jean-Nicolas Beuze
subtitle:
Are refugees good for Canada?

The 2016 census give us useful data:

• refugees get jobs at the same rate as anybody else 

• they pay more taxes than they receive social benefits

• they create jobs

• they buy houses

• they become Canadian citizens

What’s your response? pic.twitter.com/laNWtGKBGh
